content.rendered:
Kindergarten | First Grade | Second Grade | Third Grade | Fourth Grade | Fifth Grade

Kindergarten Supply List

  • 6 boxes – Crayola Crayons
  • 2 dozen #2 Ticonderoga pencils (sharpened)
  • 8 Skinny Expo Dry Erase Markers (black)
  • 1 pair Fiskars scissors
  • 4  Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • Headphones (in a Ziploc bag labeled with name)
  • 1 box of tissues (can be generic)
  • 1 canister of Wet Ones (or generic equivalent) – fragrance free
  • 2 baby wipe packages

Additional Supplies needed for Kindergarten

  • Healthy Snack
  • Water Bottle
  • Sneakers for PE
  • Backpack (no wheels)
  • Art Smock (a bigger older shirt will work)
  • Change of clothes

First Grade Supply List

  • 30 or more standard size sharpened pencils
  • 3 or more glue sticks, no glitter or scnted. please
  • 2 boxes of crayons- 24 count
  • 1 box of colored pencils
  • 2 boxes of markers
  • 4 or more large, black, Expo dry erase markers
  • large box of tissues

Please Label the Following Items with Your Child’s Name

  • standard supply box
  • pointed scissors
  • plastic folder with prongs and two pockets (no binders, please)-this will be labeled with your child’s name the first week of school
  • headphones (no earbuds or rechargeable, please)
  • change of clothes in a Ziploc bag-labeled with name
  • Art smock (or oversized T-shirt)-labeled with name
  • a healthy snack and reusable water bottle daily

Optional Items: These are items used frequently in our classrooms. If you would like to donate an item or two, it would be greatly appreciated!

  • Hand sanitizer-small pump bottles and large refill bottles
  • Lysol wipes
  • Sandwich or gallon sized Ziplock bags

Second Grade Supply List

  • 3 glue sticks
  • 1 box colored pencils
  • 1 box crayons – No Larger Than 24
  • 2 boxes of #2 Pencils (Sharpened)
  • 1 handheld pencil sharpener
  • 1 two-pocket folder
  • 4 black dry erase markers (think or thin)
  • 2 large pink erasers
  • 1 pair scissors
  • 1 box of self-seal #10 (size 4 18 by 9 ½) envelopes
  • Headphones in a labeled bag
  • Sturdy supply box – No wider than 7” or longer than 13”
  • 1 box of tissues
  • 1 package of baby wipes
  • 1 three ring binder 1”
  • You do NOT need an art smock in 2nd grade

Third Grade Supply List*

  • Headphones
  • 2 glue sticks
  • Standard size plastic pencil box
  • Scissors
  • Colored pencils
  • Magic markers (pack of 10)
  • package of eraser caps
  • 3 packages #2 Pencils (Sharpened, Ticonderoga Preferred)
  • 1 composition notebook
  • 1 package of Post-it notes
  • 4 pocket folders (red, orange, yellow, green)
  • 2 boxes of tissues
  • 2 packages Wet Ones Wipes – fragrance free
  • Backpack (no wheels)
  • Water Bottle
  • Sneakers for gym
  • Daily Healthy Snack

*If you ordered the School Tool Box supplies that the PTA is offering, you do not need to purchase the supplies above.

Fourth Grade Supply List*

  • 48 Ticonderoga #2 Pencils
  • 1- Pointed tip scissors
  • 1- Pack Crayola colored pencils (no more than 24-pack)
  • 1- Pack Crayola skinny markers
  • 3- Plastic pocket folders (Red, Blue & Green)
  • 2- Boxes of tissues
  • 1- Plastic Pencil Box
  • 2- Skinny dry erase markers
  • Headphones for computer in Ziplock baggie with student’s name
  • 1- Composition notebook
  • 1- (1/2 inch) 3 ring binder with pockets
  • 2- Black sharpies
  • 1 – 3×3 sticky notes (multi-pack)
  • 1 – Glue sticks pack

*If you ordered the School Tool Box supplies that the PTA is offering, you do not need to purchase the supplies above.

Additional supplies for Fourth Grade

Please choose 1 of the following to contribute to classroom supplies: Gallon or sandwich sized Ziplock bags, hand sanitizer, or baby wipes.

Fifth Grade Supply List*

  • #2 pencils (2 dozen, sharpened, Ticonderoga please)
  • 2 packages of 3×3 post-it notes
  • 1 box of tissues
  • 4 glue sticks
  • 1 package-colored pencils (12)
  • 1 box baby wipes
  • 1 Package thin markers
  • 1 Package dry-erase markers
  • 2-pack of black sharpies (fine or extra fine)
  • 1 highlighter
  • Soft pencil pouch
  • Scissors
  • 1 set of headphones, in a Ziploc bag labeled with student’s name
  • 2 one-subject notebooks (wide-ruled, spiral-bound preferred)
  • 5 two-pocket folders (vinyl preferred)
  • 1 manual pencil sharpener (to fit inside pencil pouch)

*If you ordered the School Tool Box supplies that the PTA is offering, you do not need to purchase the supplies above.
